marklogic.body: I did get what you mean where did i say i didnt get it? im just saying taker injured hence why his hardly there so he cant wrestle as much jericho goes for about a year AT MOST...(called a break like i said read what i said) and like i said he didnt try to distance from it rock did... rock was gone for seven years SEVEN not because he was injured or a break cause he fucked of to Hollywood and about taker getting a Spot? well it is taker and jericho? same thing like you said they deserve it and jericho not doing what rocks doing hes in matches so it different and about them moaning about the rock? well i admit they are twats i rather see them three in wrestlemania cause they are legends.
